title: New Albanian Bank Street Brewhouse
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Earth Friends Cafe moved back to this location and changed name to Bank Street Brewhouse, which is operated by the same team but under the ownership of New Albanian Brewing Company. Offers vegetarian and vegan choices, and the weekend brunch menu includes vegan biscuits and gravy as well as beer-infused pancakes. Has vegan desserts, plant milk options, vegan cheese substitute. The meats served are chicken and seafood.
